item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 08/08/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Introduced a Card-Style Agent Listing Page: Experience our newly designed layout for a more visual and organized way to browse agents. Added Model Switching Capability: Users can now switch between different large language models, including GPT-4o-mini, GPT-4o, and Mistral Large, directly from the interface. Customizable Automatic Transfer Back to AI Agent: Automate the transfer back to the AI agent after a customizable minutes of inactivity from a live agent.
